meanings.definition: Relating to the influence of the mind on bodily functions.
meanings.sent1: Her psychogenically induced calmness helped her body relax.
meanings.sent2: The therapist explained how stress can affect us psychogenically.
meanings.sent3: His psychogenically controlled heartbeat surprised the doctors.
meanings.sent4: The power of positive thinking can work psychogenically on our health.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing success can impact us psychogenically.

meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with a psychogenically induced headache.
meanings.sent2: His psychogenically triggered anxiety attacks were challenging to manage.
meanings.sent3: The psychogenically rooted fear of spiders made her jump at every shadow.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the accident haunted him psychogenically.
meanings.sent5: The psychogenically driven phobia paralyzed him with fear.
